TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CommandLineBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含用于构造命令行的实用工具方法。

span.span: Comprises utility methods for constructing a command line.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建运行[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。The following example creates a that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). ， ，和使用类来生成所需运行任务的信息。The , , and classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task. summary.span: 在命令行的后面追加指定的 对象的文件名。

span.span: Appends the command line with the file name of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的任务项规范，命令行的后面追加，并在加上引号，如有必要的任务项规范。This method appends the command line with a task item specification, and surrounds task item specification with quotations marks as necessary. 如果命令行不为空，则此方法还后面添加命令行的前的任务项规范的一个空格。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the task item specification. ## Examples 下面的示例创建运行[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。The following example creates a that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). ， ，和使用类来生成所需运行任务的信息。The , , and classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task. [!code-csharp[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_ToolTask/CS/ILAsm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_ToolTask/VB/ILAsm.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendFileNameIfNotNull (string fileName);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendFileNameIfNotNull(string fileName) cil managed
Public Sub AppendFileNameIfNotNull (fileName As String)
public: void AppendFileNameIfNotNull(System::String ^ fileName);

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要追加的文件名。

span.span: The file name to append.

param.span: 如果为 ，则此方法不起作用。

span.span: If it is , then this method has no effect.

summary.span: 在命令行后面附加用参数表示的文件名（如有必要插入引号）。

span.span: Appends the command line with file name represented by the parameter, inserting quotation marks if necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法后面追加一个文件名，在命令行并使用引号将根据需要的文件名称。This method appends the command line with a file name, and surrounds the file name with quotation marks as necessary. 如果文件名称的第一个字符是一个破折号，然后`.\`添加到要将它从交换机区分开来的文件名称的开头。If the first character of the file name is a dash, then `.\` is added to the beginning of the file name to distinguish it from a switch. 如果命令行不为空，则此方法还后面添加命令行中使用的文件名称前的一个空格。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file name. ## Examples `AppendFileNameIfNotNull("-StrangeFileName.cs")` 生成`.\-StrangeFileName.cs`。`AppendFileNameIfNotNull("-StrangeFileName.cs")` yields `.\-StrangeFileName.cs`.

summary.span: 在命令行的后面追加文件名列表，并在必要时插入引号。

span.span: Appends the command line with a list of file names, inserting quotation marks if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendFileNamesIfNotNull (Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] fileItems, string delimiter);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] fileItems, string delimiter) cil managed
Public Sub AppendFileNamesIfNotNull (fileItems As ITaskItem(), delimiter As String)

param.name: fileItems
param.span: 要追加的任务项规范。

span.span: The task item specifications to append.

param.span: 如果数组为 ，则此方法不起作用。

span.span: If the array is , then this method has no effect.

param.name: delimiter
param.span: 要放置在命令行中任务项规范之间的分隔符。

span.span: The delimiter to put between task item specifications in the command line.

summary.span: 向命令行中追加指定的 数组中的文件名列表，名称由指定的分隔符分隔。

span.span: Appends the command line with the list of file names in the specified array, separated by the specified delimiter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将文件名称和命令行的后面追加，并在用引号引起来根据需要的文件名称。This method appends the command line with file names, and surrounds the file names with quotation marks as necessary. 指定的分隔符分隔文件名称。The file names are separated by the specified delimiter. 如果命令行不为空，然后此方法还命令行的后面追加一个空格，文件名的前面。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file names. ## Examples 请参阅中的示例。See example in .

param.name: fileNames
param.span: 要追加的文件名。

span.span: The file names to append.

param.span: 如果数组为 ，则此方法不起作用。

span.span: If the array is , then this method has no effect.

param.name: delimiter
param.span: 要在命令行中的文件名之间放置的分隔符。

span.span: The delimiter to put between file names in the command line.

summary.span: 向命令行中追加指定的 数组中的文件名列表，名称由指定的分隔符分隔。

span.span: Appends the command line with the list of file names in the specified array, separated by the specified delimiter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将文件名称和命令行的后面追加，并在用引号引起来根据需要的文件名称。This method appends the command line with file names, and surrounds the file names with quotation marks as necessary. 指定的分隔符分隔文件名称。The file names are separated by the specified delimiter. 如果命令行不为空，然后此方法还命令行的后面追加一个空格，文件名的前面。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file names. ## Examples `AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Beta.cs"}, ",")` 生成`Alpha.cs,Beta.cs`。`AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Beta.cs"}, ",")` yields `Alpha.cs,Beta.cs`.

summary.span: 在命令行的后面追加文件名，并在必要时在文件名的两侧加上引号。

span.span: Appends the command line with a file name, and surrounds the file name with quotation marks as necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文件名称的第一个字符是一个破折号，然后`.\`添加到要将它从交换机区分开来的文件名称的开头。If the first character of the file name is a dash, then `.\` is added to the beginning of the file name to distinguish it from a switch. 此方法不将在命令行的一个空格，附加之前执行。This method does not append the command line with a space, before executing. ## Examples `AppendFileNameWithQuoting("-StrangeFileName.cs")` 生成`.\-StrangeFileName.cs`。`AppendFileNameWithQuoting("-StrangeFileName.cs")` yields `.\-StrangeFileName.cs`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法封装用引号引起来根据需要单独的文件名称。This method encapsulates individual file names with quotation marks as necessary. 如果命令行不为空，然后此方法还命令行的后面追加一个空格，开关的前面。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch. ## Examples 请参阅中的示例。See example in .

span.span: Appends the command line with a switch that takes a single string parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法封装用引号引起来根据需要单独的文件名称。This method encapsulates individual file names with quotation marks as necessary. 如果命令行不为空，然后此方法还命令行的后面追加一个空格，开关的前面。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch. ## Examples `AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/source:", "File Name.cs")` 生成`/source:\"File Name.cs\"`。`AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/source:", "File Name.cs")` yields `/source:\"File Name.cs\"`.

span.span: Appends the command line with a switch that takes an array of string parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法封装用引号引起来根据需要单独的文件名称。This method encapsulates individual file names with quotation marks as necessary. 如果命令行不为空，然后此方法还命令行的后面追加一个空格，开关的前面。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch. ## Examples `AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` 生成`/sources:Alpha.cs;\"Be ta.cs\"`。`AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` yields `/sources:Alpha.cs;\"Be ta.cs\"`.

summary.span: 在命令行的后面追加一个开关，但不尝试在开关参数的两侧加上引号。

span.span: Appends the command line with a switch, without attempting to encapsulate the switch parameters with quotation marks.

summary.span: 在命令行的后面追加一个采用作为单个字符串参数的任务项规范的开关，但不尝试在其两侧加上引号。

span.span: Appends the command line with a switch that takes an array of task item specifications that act as string parameters, without attempting to encapsulate them with quotation marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命令行不为空，然后此方法还命令行的后面追加一个空格，开关的前面。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch. ## Examples 请参阅中的示例。See example in .

summary.span: 在命令行的后面追加一个采用字符串参数数组的开关，但不尝试在开关参数的两侧加上引号。

span.span: Appends the command line with a switch that takes an array of string parameters, without attempting to encapsulate switch parameters with quotation marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命令行不为空，然后此方法还命令行的后面追加一个空格，开关的前面。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch. ## Examples `AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` 生成`/sources:Alpha.cs;Be ta.cs`。`AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` yields `/sources:Alpha.cs;Be ta.cs`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendTextUnquoted (string textToAppend);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendTextUnquoted(string textToAppend) cil managed
Public Sub AppendTextUnquoted (textToAppend As String)
public: void AppendTextUnquoted(System::String ^ textToAppend);

param.name: textToAppend
param.span: 要追加到命令行中的字符串。

span.span: The string to append to the command line.

summary.span: 在命令行中追加字符串，而不尝试将字符串封装在引号中。

span.span: Appends the command line with string, without attempting to encapsulate the string with quotation marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不将在命令行的一个空格，附加之前执行。This method does not append the command line with a space, before executing. ## Examples `AppendTextUnquoted(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` 生成`Folder name\\filename.cs`。`AppendTextUnquoted(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` yields `Folder name\\filename.cs`.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void AppendTextWithQuoting (string textToAppend);
.method familyhidebysig instance void AppendTextWithQuoting(string textToAppend) cil managed
Protected Sub AppendTextWithQuoting (textToAppend As String)
protected: void AppendTextWithQuoting(System::String ^ textToAppend);

param.name: textToAppend
param.span: 要追加到命令行中的字符串。

span.span: The string to append to the command line.

summary.span: 在命令行后追加字符串，并在必要时用引号将字符串引起来。

span.span: Appends the command line with string, and surrounds the string with quotations marks as necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不将在命令行的一个空格，附加之前执行。This method does not append the command line with a space, before executing. ## Examples `AppendTextWithQuoting(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` 生成`\"Folder name\\filename.cs\"`。`AppendTextWithQuoting(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` yields `\"Folder name\\filename.cs\"`.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void VerifyThrowNoEmbeddedDoubleQuotes (string switchName, string parameter);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void VerifyThrowNoEmbeddedDoubleQuotes(string switchName, string parameter) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub VerifyThrowNoEmbeddedDoubleQuotes (switchName As String, parameter As String)
protected: virtual void VerifyThrowNoEmbeddedDoubleQuotes(System::String ^ switchName, System::String ^ parameter);

param.name: switchName
param.span: 表示错误消息的开关名称的字符串。

span.span: A string representing the switch name for the error message.

param.name: parameter
param.span: 一个字符串，表示用于扫描双引号的开关参数。

span.span: A string representing the switch parameter to scan for double-quotes.

summary.span: 如果命令行参数包含双引号 (") 字符，则返回错误。

span.span: Returns an error if the command line parameter contains a double-quote (") character.

summary.span: 因为在命令行参数中双引号是非法字符，此方法可帮助防止参数注入攻击。

span.span: Because double quotes are illegal in command line parameters, this method helps prevent parameter injection attacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个虚拟方法，以便你的应用程序可以替代此方法，如果你想要允许在文件名中转义双引号。 is a virtual method so that your applications can override this method if you want to allow double-quotes escaped in filenames.
